definitions.definition: an acutely disturbed state of mind that occurs in fever, intoxication, and other disorders and is characterized by restlessness, illusions, and incoherence of thought and speech.
examples: derangement, dementia, madness, insanity; Moreincoherence, irrationality, hysteria, feverishness, hallucination "she had fits of delirium"Moreincoherence, irrationality, hysteria, feverishness, hallucination she had fits of delirium
ecstasy, rapture, transports, wild emotion, passion, wildness, excitement, frenzy, feverishness, fever; Moreeuphoria, elation "the delirium of desire"Moreeuphoria, elation the delirium of desire
